Introduction

Li Wen Han, popularly known as Wenhan, is a Chinese singer and actor under Yuehua Entertainment. He made his official debut on October 20, 2014, as a member of the South Korean-Chinese boy group UNIQ.

In 2019, he participated in the Chinese boy group survival program Idol Producer Season 2 (Also known as Youth With You) and ended up becoming a member of the project boy group UNINE. This made him one of the most popular idols in China.
